posts.content:
- February 1959 Standard Microbus.
- USA bus with clear VIN stamp, VIN plate & m-code plate all still in place.
- Comes with USA title & is custom cleared & on the NOVA system already so easy to register, (comes with NOVA notification letter).
- Pre-60 so no MOT required to register or use.
- Original paint could do with a clean and buff up but a nice starting point.
- Roof is over painted in silver but nice OG paint underneath and cleans off fairly easily with thinners or graffiti remover.
- Inside is also painted silver, (WHY!!), but again it comes off to reveal og paint.
- Bus needs the usual lower 6” repairs, but the rest of the body is good.
- Front panel has dent in bottom section that will probably work out.
- All window recesses look nice including front screens.
- Roof is very nice & solid including all gutters, inside & out.
- Doors need minor bottom edge repairs or use as they are.
- Rear hatch is nice.
- Most glass, catches, locks, etc are present.
- Main chassis rails in good condition but needs I-beam repairs, outriggers, jack points, etc.
- Needs front floor & cargo floor repairs or replacement.
- Rolls nicely on decent looking running gear & 14” bus wheels with “roller” tyres (that do hold air for transporting).
- Bus steers & handbrake works.

- Needs: Engine, Early style passenger door (to be correct), Engine lid, Valance, Rear bumper, lock & handle for rear hatch, correct "dollar" rear lights, probably some other odds'n'sods.

Please telephone or PM with any questions, or come and view at DT9, just off the A303, Somerset.

More photos here: http://s1179.photobucket.com/user/busbe ... 20microbus

Priced at £8500 ono for an early original paint project

Thanks for looking.

Ben (07742 408558)
